Traits.Name: Life Drain Aura
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of C'thithr'zho takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Traits.Name: Conduit of Despair
Traits.Content: When C'thithr'zho takes damage, it can choose to regain hit points equal to half the damage taken.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: C'thithr'zho's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: eldritch blast, minor illusion. 3/day each: hunger of Hadar, fear, dominate person. 1/day each: power word stun, psychic scream.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If C'thithr'zho fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: C'thithr'zho makes two attacks with Devour Life and one attack with Eviscerate.

Actions.Name: Devour Life
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +16 to hit, dealing 17 (2d10 + 6) necrotic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, C'thithr'zho regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Actions.Name: Eviscerate
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +16 to hit, dealing 45 (7d10 + 6) slashing damage. The creature must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Desolation's Embrace
Actions.Content: C'thithr'zho unleashes a wave of despair in a 60-foot radius. Each creature within range must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 60 (11d10) psychic damage and be frightened until the end of their next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryActions.Name: Siphon Spirit (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: C'thithr'zho targets one creature within 60 feet and attempts to siphon their life force. The creature must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or take 20 (4d8 + 6) necrotic damage, and C'thithr'zho regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and C'thithr'zho regains no hit points.

LegendaryActions.Name: Wail of the Damned (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: C'thithr'zho issues a haunting cry that targets one creature. The creature must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes incapacitated until the end of its next turn as the sound of lament fills their mind with despair.

LegendaryActions.Name: Shadow of Oblivion (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: C'thithr'zho manifests a dark shadow that spreads within a 30-foot radius around itself. Each creature within range must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take 50 (9d10) necrotic damage and are blinded until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take half as much damage and are not blinded.
